title: Did Caravan Migrants Demand $50K from the U.S. to Return Home?
subtitle: A small group of migrants awaiting their fate in Tijuana asked that they either be allowed into the U.S. to process their asylum claims or be paid to go home.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Caravan migrants demanded $50,000 payments from the U.S. in order to go home.
